response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item holds immense value and significance, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection. We are offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $14,500. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $15,000 to you, at a price that represents an outstanding value. We look forward to your consideration and hope to facilitate a transaction that benefits us both.", "product_price": 14500}
